amendment.description: To increase funding for the Healthy Fluid Milk Incentives Program, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3190 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3190 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3190 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3190 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
